officialTitle: The Effect and Safety of Low Dose Nebulized Epinephrine in the Treatment of Croup
inclusionCriteria:
* croup children between 6 month and 5 years old
* Westley croup score between 3 and 11
* Must have minimum age of 6 Months
* Must have maximum age of 5 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* underlying lung or heart disase
* contra indication to dexamethasone
* immune deficient state
* preterm birth
* previous intubation or apnea history
